## ⚔️ Refutation Argument | 证伪论证

### 1. Logical Contradiction (if applicable) | 逻辑矛盾

> 指出该公理与模型内其他公理之间的逻辑冲突

```
Axiom X states: ...
Axiom Y states: ...
These two axioms contradict because: ...
```

### 2. Derivation Error (if applicable) | 推导错误

> 指出从前提到结论的推理链中的逻辑漏洞

```
Premise 1: ...
Premise 2: ...
Claimed Conclusion: ...
Error in Step N: ...
```

### 3. Empirical Falsification (if applicable) | 经验证伪

> 指出与已知科学事实或可重复实验的冲突

**How it contradicts MVM**:

## 📐 Formal Representation (optional) | 形式化表示

> 如果可能，请用形式逻辑或数学语言表达你的证伪

```
∀x (P(x) → Q(x))  [MVM Claim]
∃x (P(x) ∧ ¬Q(x)) [Counterexample]
Therefore: ¬∀x (P(x) → Q(x))
```
